content.body: nicolo-ribaudo: I remember the reason GetExports is harder to define now - we have that information for ECMAScript modules, but not for Wasm modules
content.formatted_body: nicolo-ribaudo: I remember the reason GetExports is harder to define now - we have that information for ECMAScript modules, but not for Wasm modules

content.body: unless we treat it as a concrete method to be implemented separately in the Wasm spec
so I don't know if I can easily come up with an implementation for it right now?
an alternative might be to say that `exports` is only defined for JS module sources
content.formatted_body: an alternative might be to say that exports is only defined for JS module sources
